Question
========

The length of time it took for a number of doctoral students to complete their doctoral research was determined. The results are shown in the following table:

  --------------------------- --- ---- ---- ---- --- --- Duration of doctoral research 3 4 5 6 7 8 Number (**in percent**) 2 24 42 22 8 2 --------------------------- --- ---- ---- ---- --- ---

When given that 37 doctoral students took longer than 4 years to complete years, how many people in total were in this study?

Answerlist
----------

* 100
* 50
* 74
* Not to be determined

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 100: Incorrect
* 50: Correct
* 74: Incorrect
* Undeterminable: Incorrect
